comment: /**  * Closes this {@link ApplicationContext} and its parent hierarchy if any.  * @param context the context to close (can be {@code null})  */
code: /**  * Closes this {@link ApplicationContext} and its parent hierarchy if any.  * @param context the context to close (can be {@code null})  */ public static void closeAll(ApplicationContext context) {     if (context != null) {         if (context instanceof ConfigurableApplicationContext) {             ((ConfigurableApplicationContext) context).close().         }         closeAll(context.getParent()).     } }
